The bioinformatic plateform InforBio  (formerly ARTbio) offers online bioinformatics training tailored to the needs of research labs, with small group sessions to ensure personalized learning. Our program is designed to help you acquire key skills for independent data analysis.

We offer a comprehensive 6-month program dedicated to scRNAseq analysis (R, Seurat), structured into two complementary modules.

Training Program
R Training (January to March 2025) ‚Äì 10 sessions of 2.5 hours ‚Äì ‚Ç¨800
This course covers the basics of R, data organization and filtering, basic statistics, and creation of publication-ready graphics. The goal is to make you self-sufficient in using R for your own analyses.
scRNAseq Data Analysis (April to June 2025) ‚Äì 10 sessions of 2.5 hours ‚Äì ‚Ç¨2000
Learn how to analyze single-cell RNA sequencing data through practical examples. You'll work on a provided dataset and receive personalized feedback on your own projects. This training requires a proficiency in R.

The complete training package is available for ‚Ç¨2500.
Key Highlights:
Small group sessions for interactive and personalized learning.
Hands-on practice with an individualized project presented at the end of each training course.
Tailored feedback on your own data.
